questions_and_notes: Can we describe this as the "surface air" value or would that differ from the value in the lowest layer? It needs a scalar vertical coordinate.
specific_issues: 2:Modify dimensions.  Add or remove scalar coordinate.
long_name: O3 Volume Mixing Ratio in Lowest Model Layer
comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.
